message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This item holds significant value to me and I believe it would be equally beneficial to you given its worth of $10,000 to you. Considering its unique features and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire it at a special price. My offer to you is $12,000. I hope this aligns with your expectations and we can facilitate a transaction that benefits both of us. Looking forward to your positive response.
